string-array.name: sql_statements_values
string-array.item: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `fn_sentences_text_fts4` USING fts4(`sentenceid` INTEGER NOT NULL, `annosetid` INTEGER, `frameid` INTEGER, `luid` INTEGER, `text`); INSERT INTO `fn_sentences_text_fts4` SELECT `sentenceid`, `annosetid`, `f`.`frameid`, `luid`, `text` FROM `fn_sentences` INNER JOIN `fn_annosets` USING (`sentenceid`) LEFT JOIN `fn_frames` AS `f` USING (`frameid`) LEFT JOIN `fn_lexunits` AS `l` USING (`luid`) WHERE `f`.`frameid` IS NOT NULL;
